titleStmt.title: Meditations and vowes, diuine and morall. Seruing for direction in Christian and ciuill practise. Deuided into two bookes. By Ios. Hall.
titleStmt.author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Humfrey Lownes, for Iohn Porter.,

notesStmt.note: The second book has separate dated title page; pagination and register are continuous.
In this edition the title page is all in black; B1r line 5 has "bread".
Incorrectly identified as STC 12679 at reel 1070:1.
Reproductions of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
